alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 2:20PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Paz and Maricopa Counties through 300 PM MST... At 220 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southeast of Vicksburg Junction, or 36 miles west of Tonopah, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Areas of blowing dust possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central La Paz and Maricopa Counties. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 56 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Tonopah Desert
